## Entity Name : Protected Data
### Author: Prathap A
### Date: 25/02/2025

#### version : 0001

from pyspark.sql.functions import udf, col, lit, when, coalesce, concat, sum, avg, max, min, count, countDistinct, date_format, to_date, datediff, months_between, year, month,  hour, minute, second, expr, asc, desc
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType, TimestampType, StringType, IntegerType, FloatType, DoubleType, BooleanType, StructType, StructField, ArrayType, MapType
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from pyspark.sql.functions import row_number, rank, dense_rank, lag, lead, ntile
from pyspark.sql import SQLContext
from pyspark.sql import DataFrame
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql.avro.functions import from_avro, to_avro
from pyspark.sql.streaming import DataStreamReader, DataStreamWriter
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql.catalog import Catalog
from pyspark.sql.column import Column
from pyspark.sql.group import GroupedData
from pyspark.sql.pandas.functions import pandas_udf

from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

spark.sql("""
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC (
        RefNo                           STRING,
        EthnicOrigin                    STRING,
        ReligiousDenominationKey        STRING,
        SxO                             STRING,
        DisabilityText                  STRING,
        file_name                       STRING,
        load_date                       STRING,
        Grade                           STRING
    )
    USING DELTA

spark.sql("""
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_harmonised_db.protected_data (
        RefNo                           STRING,
        EthnicOrigin                    STRING,
        ReligiousDenominationKey        STRING,
        SxO                             STRING,
        DisabilityText                  STRING,
        file_name                       STRING,
        load_date                       STRING,
        Grade                           STRING
    )
    USING DELTA

%%sql

delete from odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC ;

insert into odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC(



SELECT 
	   RefNo
      ,NULLIF(EthnicOrigin, '')
      ,NULLIF(ReligiousDenominationKey, '')
      ,NULLIF(SxO, '')
      ,NULLIF(DisabilityText, '')
	  ,null as file_name
	  ,current_date(),
	   Grade

from odw_standardised_db.sap_protected_monthly

%%sql

 WITH pc AS (
            SELECT 
                file_name AS file,
                CONVERT(varchar(7), CONVERT(date, RIGHT(REPLACE(file_name, '.xlsx', ''), 8), 103), 126) AS file_name,
                COUNT(*) AS s_count
            FROM odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC
            WHERE RefNo IS NOT NULL
            GROUP BY file_name, CONVERT(varchar(7), CONVERT(date, RIGHT(REPLACE(file_name, '.xlsx', ''), 8), 103), 126)
        ),
        x2 AS (
            SELECT 
                LEFT(CAST(h.Report_MonthEnd_Date AS varchar(10)), 7) AS r_month, 
                COUNT(*) AS history_rows
            FROM 
                odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR h 
            WHERE 
                LEFT(CAST(Report_MonthEnd_Date AS varchar(10)), 7) > '2019-03' 
                AND h.PayrollArea = 'PINS'
            GROUP BY 
                LEFT(CAST(Report_MonthEnd_Date AS varchar(10)), 7)
        )

        -- Delete operation
        DELETE FROM odw_harmonised_db.protected_data
        WHERE file_name IN (
            SELECT pc.file
            FROM pc 
            INNER JOIN x2 ON pc.file_name = x2.r_month
            WHERE pc.s_count = x2.history_rows
        );

        -- Insert operation
        INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.protected_data
        SELECT * 
        FROM odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_PC
        WHERE file_name IN (
            SELECT pc.file
            FROM pc 
            INNER JOIN x2 ON pc.file_name = x2.r_month
            WHERE pc.s_count = x2.history_rows
